text:
I am 77. I recall the polio epidemic in the UK in the 1950s. Even as a child I heard the news and adults talking. Heard about children condemned to to live in something called an iron lung. 
Scarlet fever was another scare.

text: General George Washington ordered his troops at Valley Forge, Pennsylvania to receive a new medical technology from France.  It was a smallpox inoculation called "variolation" that evolved into VACCINES.  Smallpox was killing soldiers faster than the British until Washington basically vaccinated his troops.  Is this no longer taught in schools?  Enough people have to be vaccinated in order for the group immunity to protect everyone.  Access to healthcare is being ripped away at the same time.  What happens when they've been kicked off of insurance and their unvaccinated butts start getting sick?
